00021 Path &
00022 Path::pop_back()
00023 {
00024   _points.pop_back();
00025   return *this;
00026 }
00027 
00028 Path &
00029 Path::operator<<( const Point & p )
00030 {
00031   _points.push_back( p );
00032   return *this;
00033 }
00034 
00035 Point
00036 Path::center() const {
00037   Rect bbox = boundingBox();
00038   return Point( bbox.left + bbox.width/2.0, 
00039     bbox.top  - bbox.height/2.0 );
00040 }
00041 
00042 Path &
00043 Path::rotate( double angle, const Point & rotCenter )
00044 {
00045   std::vector<Point>::iterator i = _points.begin();
00046   std::vector<Point>::iterator end = _points.end();
00047   while ( i != end ) {
00048     i->rotate( angle, rotCenter );
00049     ++i;
00050   }
00051   return *this;
00052 }
00053 
00054 Path
00055 Path::rotated( double angle, const Point & rotCenter ) const
00056 {
00057   Path res(*this);
00058   std::vector<Point>::iterator i = res._points.begin();
00059   std::vector<Point>::iterator end = res._points.end();
00060   while ( i != end ) {
00061     i->rotate( angle, rotCenter );
00062     ++i;
00063   }
00064   return res;
00065 }
00066 
00067 Path &
00068 Path::rotate( double angle )
00069 {
00070   return Path::rotate( angle, center() );
00071 }
00072 
00073 Path
00074 Path::rotated( double angle ) const
00075 {
00076   Path res(*this);
00077   return static_cast<Path&>( res.rotate( angle, center() ) );
00078 }

00080 Path &
00081 Path::translate( double dx, double dy )
00082 {
00083   std::vector<Point>::iterator i = _points.begin();
00084   std::vector<Point>::iterator end = _points.end();
00085   Point delta( dx, dy );
00086   while ( i != end ) {
00087     (*i) += delta;
00088     ++i;
00089   }
00090   return *this;
00091 }
00092 
00093 Path
00094 Path::translated( double dx, double dy ) const
00095 {
00096   Path res(*this);
00097   std::vector<Point>::iterator i = res._points.begin();
00098   std::vector<Point>::iterator end = res._points.end();
00099   Point delta( dx, dy );
00100   while ( i != end ) {
00101     (*i) += delta;
00102     ++i;
00103   }
00104   return res;
00105 }
00106 
00107 Path &
00108 Path::scale( double sx, double sy )
00109 {
00110   Point c = center();
00111   translate( -c.x, -c.y );
00112   std::vector<Point>::iterator i = _points.begin();
00113   std::vector<Point>::iterator end = _points.end();
00114   while ( i != end ) {
00115     i->x *= sx;
00116     i->y *= sy;
00117     ++i;
00118   }
00119   Point delta = c - center();
00120   translate( delta.x, delta.y );
00121   return *this;  
00122 }
00123 
00124 Path &
00125 Path::scale( double s )
00126 {
00127   return Path::scale( s, s );
00128 }
00129 
00130 Path
00131 Path::scaled( double sx, double sy ) const
00132 {
00133   return Path(*this).scale( sx, sy );
00134 }
00135 
00136 Path
00137 Path::scaled( double s) const
00138 {
00139   return Path(*this).scale( s, s );
00140 }

00142 void
00143 Path::scaleAll( double s )
00144 {
00145   std::vector<Point>::iterator it = _points.begin();
00146   std::vector<Point>::iterator end = _points.end();
00147   while ( it != end ) {
00148     (*it) *= s;
00149     ++it;
00150   }
00151 }

00153 void
00154 Path::flushPostscript( std::ostream & stream,
00155            const TransformEPS & transform ) const
00156 {
00157   if ( _points.empty() )
00158     return;
00159   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator i = _points.begin();
00160   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator end = _points.end();
00161 
00162   stream << transform.mapX( i->x ) << " " << transform.mapY( i->y ) << " m";
00163   ++i;
00164   while ( i != end ) {
00165     stream << " " << transform.mapX( i->x ) << " " << transform.mapY( i->y ) << " l";
00166     ++i;
00167   }
00168   if ( _closed ) stream << " cp";
00169   stream << " ";
00170 }
00171 
00172 void
00173 Path::flushFIG( std::ostream & stream,
00174     const TransformFIG & transform ) const
00175 {
00176   if ( _points.empty() )
00177     return;
00178 
00179   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator i = _points.begin();
00180   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator end = _points.end();
00181   while ( i != end ) {
00182     stream << " " << static_cast<int>( transform.mapX( i->x ) )
00183      << " " << static_cast<int>( transform.mapY( i->y ) );
00184     ++i;
00185   }
00186   if ( _closed ) { 
00187     stream << " " << static_cast<int>( transform.mapX( _points.begin()->x ) )
00188      << " " << static_cast<int>( transform.mapY( _points.begin()->y ) );
00189   }  
00190 }
00191 
00192 void
00193 Path::flushSVGCommands( std::ostream & stream,
00194       const TransformSVG & transform ) const
00195 {
00196   if ( _points.empty() )
00197     return;
00198   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator i = _points.begin();
00199   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator end = _points.end();
00200   int count = 0;
00201   
00202   stream << "M " << transform.mapX( i->x ) << " " << transform.mapY( i->y );
00203   ++i;
00204   while ( i != end ) {
00205     stream << " L " << transform.mapX( i->x ) << " " << transform.mapY( i->y );
00206     ++i;
00207     count = ( count + 1 ) % 6;
00208     if ( !count ) stream << "\n                  ";
00209   }
00210   if ( _closed ) 
00211     stream << " Z" << std::endl;
00212 }
00213 
00214 void
00215 Path::flushSVGPoints( std::ostream & stream,
00216           const TransformSVG & transform ) const
00217 {
00218   if ( _points.empty() )
00219     return;
00220   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator i = _points.begin();
00221   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator end = _points.end();
00222   int count = 0;
00223   stream << transform.mapX( i->x ) << "," << transform.mapY( i->y );
00224   ++i;
00225   while ( i != end ) {
00226     stream << " " << transform.mapX( i->x ) << "," << transform.mapY( i->y );
00227     ++i;
00228     count = ( count + 1 ) % 6;
00229     if ( !count ) stream << "\n                  ";
00230   }
00231 }
00232 
00233 #ifdef WITH_CAIRO
00234 void
00235 Path::flushCairoPoints( cairo_t *cr,
00236      const TransformCairo & transform ) const
00237 {
00238   if ( _points.empty() )
00239     return;
00240   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator i = _points.begin();
00241   std::vector<Point>::const_iterator end = _points.end();
00242   int count = 0;
00243   cairo_move_to (cr, transform.mapX( i->x ), transform.mapY( i->y ));
00244   ++i;
00245   while ( i != end ) {
00246     cairo_line_to (cr, transform.mapX( i->x ), transform.mapY( i->y ));
00247     ++i;
00248     count = ( count + 1 ) % 6;
00249     //if ( !count ) stream << "\n                  ";
00250   }
00251 }
00252 #endif

00254 Rect
00255 Path::boundingBox() const
00256 {
00257   if ( _points.empty() )
00258     return Rect( 0, 0, 0, 0 );
00259   Rect rect;
00260   std::vector< Point >::const_iterator i = _points.begin();
00261   std::vector< Point >::const_iterator end = _points.end();
00262   rect.top = i->y;
00263   rect.left = i->x;
00264   rect.width = 0.0;
00265   rect.height = 0.0;
00266   ++i;
00267   while ( i != end ) { 
00268     if ( i->x < rect.left ) { 
00269       double dw = rect.left - i->x;
00270       rect.left = i->x;
00271       rect.width += dw;
00272     } else if ( i->x > rect.left + rect.width ) {
00273       rect.width = i->x - rect.left;
00274     }
00275     if ( i->y > rect.top ) { 
00276       double dh = i->y - rect.top;
00277       rect.top = i->y;
00278       rect.height += dh;
00279     } else if ( i->y < rect.top - rect.height ) {
00280       rect.height = rect.top - i->y;
00281     }
00282     ++i;
00283   }
00284   return rect;
00285 }
